mapper.select: select id, picture, name, nation_name, description, create_time, update_time, is_delete from disk_map_block where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into disk_map_block(picture, name, nation_name, description, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values (#{picture}, #{name}, #{nationName}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDelete})

insert into disk_map_block(picture, name, nation_name, description, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.picture}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.nationName}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})

insert into disk_map_block(picture, name, nation_name, description, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.picture}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.nationName}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})
on duplicate key update picture = values(picture), name = values(name), nation_name = values(nation_name), description = values(description), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_delete = values(is_delete)
mapper.update:
update disk_map_block
picture = #{picture},
name = #{name},
nation_name = #{nationName},
description = #{description},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
where id = #{id}
